title: As Europe Approves New Tech Laws, the U.S. Falls Further Behind - The New York Times
content:
1. As Europe Approves New Tech Laws, the U.S. Falls Further Behind  The New York Times
  2. Tech Companies Face Billions in Fines Under EU Content Rules  Bloomberg
  3. EU poised to unveil rules forcing Big Tech to protect users  ABC News
  4. EU targets U.S. tech giants with a new rulebook aimed at curbing their dominance  CNBC
  5. Analysis: New EU rules regulating U.S. tech giants likely to set global standard  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Federal privacy bills, security legislation and antitrust laws to address the power of the tech giants have all failed to advance in Congress, despite hand wringing and shows of bipartisan support.
